trans-unit.source: Represents an association between a source <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> or <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>, and a target object which can be a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un'associazione tra un'origine <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>e un oggetto di destinazione che può essere un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> o una risorsa esterna.

trans-unit.source: A PackageRelationship defines an association between a *source* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a *target* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Un PackageRelationship definisce un'associazione tra un *origine* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>per un *destinazione* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>o una risorsa esterna.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The source object is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto di origine è considerato il "proprietario" della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The PackageRelationship class has no public constructor; instead, two Create methods are used: ||| |-|-| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>|Creates a "package-level" relationship—from a package to a specified part or external resource.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>|Creates a "part-level" relationship—from one part to another part or external resource.| The source package or part is identified by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> property of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: La classe PackageRelationship non dispone di alcun costruttore pubblico. al contrario, vengono utilizzati i due metodi di creazione: | | | |-|-| | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>. <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>| Crea una relazione di "livello di pacchetto", ovvero da un pacchetto a una parte specificata o una risorsa esterna. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>. <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>| Crea una relazione "a livello di parte", da una parte di un'altra parte o una risorsa esterna. | Il pacchetto di origine o di parte è identificato dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>la proprietà della relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The target part or external resource is identified by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> property of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: La parte di destinazione o una risorsa esterna è identificata dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>la proprietà della relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creating or deleting a relationship does not affect the source or target objects in any way.
trans-unit.target: La creazione o eliminazione di una relazione non influenza gli oggetti di origine o di destinazione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: If a source object is deleted, all relationships owned by the object are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: Se viene eliminato un oggetto di origine, vengono eliminate anche tutte le relazioni di proprietà dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Relationships enable navigation both in a document and between documents.
trans-unit.target: Le relazioni consentono lo spostamento in un documento e tra i documenti.

trans-unit.source: Relationships also support document object model services, such as linking a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> to specific document elements when printing.
trans-unit.target: Le relazioni supportano anche i servizi modelli a oggetti documento, ad esempio un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>per elementi specifici del documento durante la stampa.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: For more information about PackageRelationship elements see Section 1.3 "Relationships" in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su PackageRelationship elementi vedere la sezione 1.3 "Relazioni", il *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that identifies the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che identifica la relazione.

trans-unit.source: The Id property string is unique for all relationships owned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> package or part.
trans-unit.target: La stringa della proprietà Id è univoca per tutte le relazioni di proprietà di <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>pacchetto o parte.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Id is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: L'Id specificato nella chiamata al **pacchetto**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> metodo che ha creato la relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created, the Id cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creata la relazione, l'Id non può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: The Id property string is a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: La stringa della proprietà Id è un identificatore XML valido.

trans-unit.source: The Id type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)).
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di Id è xsd: ID e deve seguire le convenzioni di denominazione prescritte il *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specifica (vedere [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)).

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che identifica la relazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> che contiene questa relazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> elements see the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>elementi vedere il *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The package that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Il pacchetto che contiene questa relazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified type name of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome completo del tipo della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The RelationshipType is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Elemento RelationshipType è specificato nella chiamata al **pacchetto**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> metodo che ha creato la relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created, the RelationshipType cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creata la relazione, elemento RelationshipType non può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: RelationshipType is defined in a URI-like syntax and identifies the role of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: RelationshipType è definito in una sintassi URI e identifica il ruolo della relazione.

trans-unit.source: For example, "http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource" identifies the relationship to a target part that is a "required-resource."
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, "http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource" identifica la relazione a una parte di destinazione che è un "required-resource."

trans-unit.source: **Package-Wide Relationship Types** |Description|Relationship Type| |-----------------|-----------------------| |Core Properties|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/metadata/core-properties| |Digital Signature|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/signature| |Digital Signature Certificate|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/certificate| |Digital Signature Origin|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/origin| |Thumbnail|http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/metadata/thumbnail| For more information about package relationship types see Chapter 3 and Appendix I of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: **I tipi di relazione a livello di pacchetto** | Descrizione | Tipo di relazione | |-----------------|-----------------------| | Proprietà di base | http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/metadata/core-properties | | Firma digitale | http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/signature | | Certificato di firma digitale | http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/certificate | | Origine della firma digitale | http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/digital-signature/origin | | Anteprima | http://schemas.microsoft.com/package/2006/relationships/metadata/thumbnail | Per ulteriori informazioni sulla relazione di pacchetto tipi vedere il capitolo 3 e appendice I del *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The qualified type name of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Nome completo del tipo della relazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package or part that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del pacchetto o parte proprietari della relazione.

trans-unit.source: If the relationship is owned by a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>, SourceUri returns a URI of "/".
trans-unit.target: Se la relazione appartiene a un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>, SourceUri restituisce un URI di "/".</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: If the relationship is owned by a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>, SourceUri returns the URI of the part.
trans-unit.target: Se la relazione appartiene a un oggetto <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>SourceUri restituisce l'URI della parte di.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> or <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> proprietari della relazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the target of the relationship is <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode"></xref> to the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la destinazione della relazione è <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode"> </xref> o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TargetMode is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: La TargetMode è specificato nella chiamata alla **pacchetto**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> metodo che ha creato la relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created the TargetMode cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile modificare la TargetMode dopo aver creata la relazione.

trans-unit.source: When TargetMode is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> MUST be a relative reference.
trans-unit.target: Se TargetMode è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>deve essere un riferimento relativo.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>

trans-unit.source: For a package-level relationship, the relative reference of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the pack URI of the source package that owns and contains the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Per una relazione a livello di pacchetto, il riferimento relativo del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>viene risolto relativo URI di tipo pack del pacchetto di origine che è proprietario e contiene la relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Example source package pack URI: "pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,files,datapak.package/".) For a part-level relationship, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the source part that owns the relationship (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is interpreted relative to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).
trans-unit.target: (Esempio origine pacchetto URI di tipo pack: "pack://http:, www.adatum.com, www.adatum.com,Files,datapak.package/".) Per una relazione a livello di parte, il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>viene risolto rispetto alla parte di origine a cui appartiene la relazione (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> è interpretato rispetto a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: When TargetMode is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> can be either a relative reference or a fully qualified URI.
trans-unit.target: Se TargetMode è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>può essere un URI completo o un riferimento relativo.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is a relative reference, the reference is interpreted as relative to the location of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Se la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>è un riferimento relativo, il riferimento è interpretato rispetto alla posizione del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>che contiene questa relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about TargetMode see Section 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su TargetMode, vedere la sezione 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" del *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that indicates whether <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri*> references a resource <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode"></xref> to the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Valore di enumerazione che indica se <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri*>fa riferimento a una risorsa <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode"> </xref> o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target resource of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa di destinazione della relazione.

trans-unit.source: The TargetUri is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: L'URI di destinazione è specificato nella chiamata al **pacchetto**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A> o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> metodo che ha creato la relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created the TargetUri cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creata la relazione non è possibile modificare l'URI di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, the TargetUri MUST be a relative reference.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A>è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, l'URI di destinazione deve essere un riferimento relativo.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a package-level relationship, the relative reference of the TargetUri is resolved relative to the pack URI of the source package that owns and contains the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Per una relazione a livello di pacchetto, viene risolto il riferimento relativo di TargetUri relativo URI di tipo pack del pacchetto di origine che è proprietario e contiene la relazione.

trans-unit.source: (Example source package pack URI: "pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,files,datapak.package/".) For a part-level relationship, the TargetUri is resolved relative to the source part that owns the relationship (TargetUri is interpreted relative to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).
trans-unit.target: (Esempio origine pacchetto URI di tipo pack: "pack://http:, www.adatum.com, www.adatum.com,Files,datapak.package/".) Per una relazione a livello di ambito, l'URI di destinazione viene risolto rispetto alla parte di origine a cui appartiene la relazione (TargetUri è interpretato rispetto a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, the TargetUri can be either a relative reference or a fully qualified URI.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A>è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode>, l'URI di destinazione può essere un riferimento relativo o un URI completo.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the TargetUri is a relative reference, the reference is interpreted as relative to the location of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Se l'URI di destinazione è un riferimento relativo, il riferimento è interpretato rispetto alla posizione del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>che contiene questa relazione.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: For more information about TargetUri see Section 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'URI di destinazione, vedere la sezione 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" del *Open Packaging Conventions* specifica disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target resource.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa di destinazione.
